member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LED7R
member.summary: An LED7R module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LED7R.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LED7R.SetLed(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the given LED to the given state.
member.param: The LED to change to set.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LED7R.SetBitmask(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Sets the LEDs on the module to the corresponding bit in the mask.
member.param: The bit mask to set the LEDs to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LED7R.TurnAllLedsOn
member.summary: Turns on all of the LEDs.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LED7R.TurnAllLedsOff
member.summary: Turns off all of the LEDs.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LED7R.SetLeds(System.Int32)
member.summary: Turns all of the LEDs on up until, but not including, the LED numbered by endIndex. The rest are turned off.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LED7R.SetPercentage(System.Double)
member.summary: Turns on the LedCount * percentage LEDs starting at LED 0.
member.param: The amount of LEDs to turn on.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LED7R.Animate(System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Animates the lights on the board, according to the passed in values.
member.param: Time between each operation in milliseconds
Whether or not the animation should play in a clockwise motion.
Whether or not the animation should turn the lights on, false if the lights should be turned off.
Whether or not a light should remain on when another one is lit, false if only one light should be lit at a time.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LED7R.LedCount
member.summary: The number of LEDs on the module.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LED7R.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: The state of the given LED.
member.param: The LED whose state to get or set.
member.returns: Whether or not the LED is on or off.
